snippet.title: Thrusta ZX Spectrum
snippet.description: Another early shooter game, but this time with Boulder Dash elements in which you push rocks to squash enemies in order to advance.  It's not the best shooter I've played but it's quite nice and the graphics are really good.  Oh the repetitive sound will stretch your head!
